cause.description:
Illiteracy is a major problem in our world today. It is a vicious cycle that causes poverty and unemployment not only in other countries, but in the United States as well. The FIRST step towards fighting this problem is by raising money to buy books for impoverished families and schools.
1. Illiteracy needs to end!
cause.mission: donate books to schools that need them for the children who need them. Our youth is the future of America!
cause.name: Fighting Illiteracy: Real Solutions Today (FIRST)
